short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracking how much time you spend surfing Google Maps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Not all who surf Google Maps are lost.

Google Maps Surfer tracks how many hours, minutes, and seconds you surf on www.google.com/maps since installing the extension. You can also log any previous hours to help bump those numbers up. Happy surfing!

Note: If you're wondering why anyone would "surf" Google Maps, why not?
